B0B1718206C141C5AB9DDA1E61364B0D.description:
Select a historical event, scientific procedure, or technical process to narrate in a
comprehensive report and presentation, practicing effective word processing,
spreadsheet, and presentation skills. Develop and strengthen writing and data
organization through planning, revising, peer-review, editing, and rewriting throughout
the course.

C09D1D060423496EA4F0BD4CA0151833.description:
Throughout the course, conduct a sustained research project to answer a question or
solve a problem. Synthesize research into an argument that is established, developed,
and supported with multiple sources of data and evidence. Demonstrate authentic
technical skills in word processing, presentations, and spreadsheet applications,
effectively combining functionality of multiple software applications to present a
coherent final project, including a report (with imported data, appendixes, etc.) and
presentation with appropriate citations from text. Use selected technology to produce,
publish, and update final projects.

7E4815B0D6D94BC2B1D9242BEA04C3E3.description:
Protect and share presentations using encryption, passwords, media
compression, and permissions, while ensuring accessibility and compatibility are
maintained for a given situation or scenario

5599F71E26F047DB8724E1EFE2E0168A.description:
Track changes and resolve differences (such as discarding changes or managing
comments) to focus on what is most significant for a specific purpose and
audience

75E2AE02B61D4AE9950AA87CF38A16CE.description:

81B2237DB42B4A13B8181A7083014A0C.description:

1A4720D3B44E4122819F061727A4CFE8.description:

6ECD87B9780543BDB93D82F775E418EB.description:

18F88B14DBF549D1B64DF58E85E80F78.description:

C326B0EC599448ABB6D232210A2203EA.description:

763886A08C5340DE8C8AF1927A3ABFE8.description:

3EBD861E5F1644A5A800938AF71005D5.description:

46959EBB829247E9A96DFD551BC00856.description:

FBB1C8C581ED48ACA5CC0EEBE2C03111.description:

3646A4443D954E2C919E23F595EE1A86.description:

C176A9D879EF436EAAFCD66DF015A091.description:
For a given content, select and employ appropriate structure to convey meaning and
organize information into categories and hierarchies appropriately, including:

F50DB21F31894F65BC45BBCEC5E2EB7A.description:

attention to slide timing, resolution, annotations, options, and appropriate views
for a given presentation venue

B4887FCDC34B4D9089A4C35ED816B4A2.description:

appropriate settings by determining most applicable handout print options, package presentations for CD, save presentations as webpages, and maintain
backwards compatibility where needed

48543EFD4C3542D4863DBEAF7BC2B2C6.description:
Customize presentation options and views to ensure accurate page setup,
printing
(color/grayscale), and navigation

6045A9630CF342DD9497F7CCBC6311EE.description:

industry by applying slide masters, layouts, background images, page numbers,

7037576B85714C81A3BEC3E0C0FDACAB.description:

6A244AEDBD1546E0B57DE63187030CF6.description:
Building on standards from Computer Applications, use presentation software to create
and manage clear and coherent multimedia presentation materials for a given audience,
task, purpose, and length of presentation. Fluently navigate software to:

40BA260BB5D24FC8A43C573F97B541C5.description:

45F4B1991449488EBC9255B32530B009.description:

1CC6DBA16E6B44D89768D5A5DE7B2AAB.description: Format and modify text with functions

34E9719A57F8442C816B3364151E17B2.description:

12003F160B124991BB95EB7599DCD26F.description:

A01A94BBD54A41D692421B5ABF5209FD.description:

C3EB4806A10F4BFE922747EA6AF6427D.description:
Accurately determine appropriate calculations (formulas and functions) for analysis to
draw conclusions about sets of data, including:

30536FB2BDD543C9AAF5DA269C293FF3.description:

removing duplicates to enhance analysis

EBF25CC547424066AA40A95FD1D71B06.description:

35A752E2351E46C49E1669737234FD1B.description:
Effectively navigate between tables and ranges, adding or removing cells and
defining titles

F15E218411A54942AA51C360E8DFBE67.description:
Translate quantitative or technical information between text, visuals, data, and equations
by accurately creating and using tables.

049FE74E2AE64A04950EF3923FC6F321.description:
Order and group cells and ranges by applying conditional formatting, inserting
sparklines, transposing columns and rows, creating named ranges, inserting

BE7737A104D74778B599C38A3AF223E2.description:
Format cells and ranges for a given purpose, including merging cells, modifying

B2A3ED0425A04015A1EDA35140C9CC07.description:

8E68A8EC9B5F4FEDAD0D150FFDFF01CA.description:

A738AD066AB5428295E71AB802F683D6.description:

8E98E94E7E7E49BB985855E6C355EB76.description:

E919125159A843DFB412972AF17AAFE0.description:

3E1CD0A7B41647A5B55DC12649BE410C.description:

F42BBF619ADA4139AF059AC79DBB21A2.description: Create new workbooks from blank worksheets, templates, imported and nonnative files

1B1E1E9DBC7F4BB8A3DBCB97FAA1336E.description:
Building on standards from Computer Applications, use a spreadsheet application to
create and manage worksheets and workbooks for business functions such as invoices,
financial statements, data review and summarization, and statistical analysis.

20CE64918310498E939DBC61BB443A0B.description:

B869CC5AD9164E6E87C6C56FBE648E1C.description:

size, shape) and text wrapping to seamlessly integrate into document

CDEFA5E388034AC1AA99B8EEB5165EBC.description: Insert quick parts, textboxes, and customizable building blocks

8E666AB75F4E42158E4F55551180AF3C.description:
Integrate multiple sources of information presented in diverse formats and media in
order to address a question or solve a problem.

B06BE557C9A14D928F0F88D5BF57FB68.description: Add and modify the font, format, location, and position of captions

5598CCDDBF0D446A8DDAC86581B900CA.description:
Insert, manage the locations, and auto-update endnotes, footnotes, citations, and
bibliographies following a standard format

C2195055E55E4528A941C1C6F53ED264.description:
Integrate information into the text selectively to maintain the flow of ideas, avoid
plagiarism, and over-reliance on any one source

CF2951DE062D48F69BF8EE0855797543.description:
Gather relevant information from multiple authoritative print and digital sources,
assessing the strengths and limitations of each source, and integrate the source
accurately into the document using citations, references, and footnotes. Select appropriate notation formatting for a given style, such as Modern Language Association
(MLA), American Psychological Association (APA), or the Chicago Manual of Style.

CDA43CDD3354476DBBCEF0178BBAFFCF.description:
Create and modify lists by employing bullets, numbering, and outlines and editing

text, objects, and sections, creating a professional document by preventing

flow of text

highlighting where needed, and using WordArt

inserting special characters where needed

F89979ED7C85443BB6D2F7AF9C71C644.description:
Effectively review, revise, and format text, paragraphs, and sections for a specific type of
word processing file (such as a company report, memo, or invoice) by completing the
following skills fluently:

BBEBE7A6DFB64C5FBF0CAF229E5F0D47.description:
Configure documents to scale, print, and save effectively, including maintaining
backwards compatibility with previous software versions and password protecting
if necessary

4C413C414F5E4056805C021583CF732B.description:
Customize viewing options to effectively navigate a project using application tools
such as zoom, toolbars, ribbons, macros, and shortcut keys

D18D19CA91C64516A41142B19F8347E5.description:

watermarks

5548A5D1772B4034B56B9251F6DC35BA.description:
Search for text within a document, insert hyperlinks, create bookmarks and use
“Go
To” functionality efficiently

9085D9CF827B4C0B8E20DB85418BFFD7.description:
Create a document from a blank document, template, imported file, or non-native
document imported into word processing software

A73B44F1CCB14E6F8535014C2D43B2AF.description:
Building on standards from Computer Applications, create and manage professional
documents of business activities to communicate with internal and external stakeholders.
Fluently navigate word processing software to complete the following:

9B39AEF8F76149BB815B336660E459C4.description:
Correctly and safely import and export digital files (such as text, audio, video, and
picture files in a variety of formats) from local and networked devices, choosing and
employing the correct cables, removable storage media, and/or hardwired or wireless
network connections. Perform basic troubleshooting as needed for enhancing
productivity and optimizing performance of devices such as cameras, scanners,
printers, and tablets. Perform basic operations to change file types for effective use in
typical software applications. For example, connect an iPad via a wireless network,
download photos from the device, and change the format of the photos from .jpg to
.png format for use in a presentation application.

C087B3D5030945B1AF54FE57322B0EC4.description:
Correctly and safely execute basic file management operations on a typical personal
computer and shared storage media, including the opening, creating, copying, moving,
deleting, and renaming of files and folders, as well as searching for a specified file or
folder on local hard drives, removable storage, or networked storage media. Build
upon this knowledge to effectively use cloud storage and/or online digital collaboration
platforms and file sharing applications. Appraise file storage needs for a given project,
recommend and effectively employ the appropriate file storage and sharing solution
given project characteristics.
